A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Boring\, so very boring.  The entire movie was a very slow chase scene\, why didn't the first order just have more ships come?  The whole plot hinged on Po not being told the plan.  Oh man I feel like PETA was involved in this movie.  And the jokes so many\, so stupid.  Poor Luke Skywalker they did him wrong.  They made him look so pathetic to get us to like the new characters\, I was already liking them he didn't deserve that.
